alert.note: Alert for Oakland (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 2:59PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Oakland County through 330 PM EDT... At 259 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over West Bloomfield, or near Pontiac, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Novi around 310 PM EDT. Northville around 325 PM EDT. South Lyon around 330 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Franklin, Keego Harbor, Waterford, Orchard Lake, Commerce, New Hudson, Sylvan Lake, Walled Lake, Bingham Farms and Farmington Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
